import React from 'react' import { Card, CardMedia, CardContent } from '@material-ui/core' import Flippy, { FrontSide, BackSide } from 'react-flippy' const styles = { root: { maxWidth: 300 } } const isReversed = Math.random >= 0.5 export default function Drawn(props) { return ( {isReversed ? : }

mouse over for meaning

{props.spread_pos}

{props.spread_meaning}

{isReversed ?

{props.card.reversed}

:

{props.card.upright}

} ) }
